item.title: codeforces 569 D. Symmetric and Transitive (组合数学 第二类斯特林数 贝尔数)
item.description: D. Symmetric and Transitive time limit per test 1.5 seconds memory limit per test 256 megabytes input standard input output standard output Little Johnny has recently learned about set theory. Now he is studying binary relations. You’ve probably heard the term “equivalence relation”. These relations are very important in many areas of mathematics. For example, the equality of the two numbers is an equivalence relation. A set ρ of pairs
